snippet.title: MD Puzzle & Action: Tant-R
snippet.description: Had no clue there was a "Bonanza Bros." bros spin-off mini-game compilation until I saw it in episode 120 of Game Center CX! Ported from the arcade to the Megadrive in 1992, this game contains a total of 16 mini-games that will challenge players reflexes and other abilities. Very neat stuff that sadly was never released in the west. Enjoy!
